name: Complex Feature Development Template
description: Template for complex feature development with comprehensive requirements

variables.ACCEPTANCE_CRITERIA: Detailed acceptance criteria for feature completion
variables.DATABASE_CHANGES: Required database schema changes and migrations
variables.API_DESIGN: API endpoints, request/response formats, and contracts
variables.ERROR_HANDLING: Error handling patterns and recovery strategies
variables.TARGET_FILES: Complete list of files to be created or modified
variables.MIGRATION_STRATEGY: Data migration and backward compatibility plan
